channel.title: Electronics on fik1
channel.description: Recent content in Electronics on fik1

item.title: Serial Pill
item.description: pill_serial.bin compile pill_serial Changed baudrate to 230400 on all three serialports in usbuart.c and also CDCACM_PACKET_SIZE to 32 according to Issue 1 more information from here: https://satoshinm.github.io/blog/171223_stm32serial_triple_usb-to-serial_adapter_using_stm32_blue_pill.html enable serial bootloader on STM32F10x boot0 = 1 boot1 = 0 and connect with a serial adapter tx = A10 rx = A9 then we need something to flash with, stm32loader is a good choice pip install pyserial stm32loader then we can flash our code, choose correct COM port
